title: Lima: Water Magic Circuit, Historic Downtown & Catacombs Tour
description: Escape the daytime heat and discover Lima by night on a private evening tour of the 'City of Kings.' Witness a magnificent laser, light, and water show at the Magical Water Circuit, located in Parque de la Reserva. Then, delve into the illuminated landmarks of downtown Lima such as the grand Catedral de Lima and the Government Palace. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included.
all_descriptions: Escape the daytime heat and discover Lima by night on a private evening tour of the 'City of Kings.' Witness a magnificent laser, light, and water show at the Magical Water Circuit, located in Parque de la Reserva. Then, delve into the illuminated landmarks of downtown Lima such as the grand Catedral de Lima and the Government Palace. Hotel pickup and drop-off are included.

Meet your guide at your hotel lobby in Lima and then head to the Parque de la Reserva to watch a light, laser, and water show at the Magical Water Circuit. Marvel at fountains dancing to music and illuminated by lasers and flashing lights.

Then, proceed to downtown Lima to see landmarks such as Catedral de Lima, the Municipal Palace, and Jiron de la Union—all of which take on a completely different appearance when illuminated.  

Your tour concludes with hotel drop-off.
provider:

2 contributions

Excellent tour and Maria very good guide

Jun 2025 • Family
Excellent tour, Maria our guide explained very well the history of the church and the catacombs, as well as other interesting facts of Lima.
The waters show very nice and entertaining.
Mention apart Maria's willingness and kindness that she had with my grandmother as she presented some problems as an older adult but Maria helped a lot so that she could also enjoy the experience.
10000% recommended

Stacie P
Windham, NH126 contributions

Very well organized and complete tour

Aug 2024 • Family
This was a great tour. They picked us up from the hotel on time. There was water and cookies waiting for us in the van. It ended up being a private tour for the two of us. We drove around the city for a little while looking at sites. Our tour guide spoke excellent English and gave a nice history of the buildings. We stopped first at the convent and catacombs and she was able to skip the lines to get in and keep us ahead of all of the other tour groups to avoid the crowds a bit. We went around the square and saw the city buildings as well. There was a wedding that we stopped to watch for a bit. She then took us to the water circuit show and showed us the fountains and the history of each and recommended the best places to watch the water show. It was very nicely done and all of the entrance fees were included (except 2 soles for the bathroom in the water circuit if you needed it).
Written August 15, 2024
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.

Nina H
Hudson Bay, Canada10 contributions

Great experience

From pick up to drop off this tour was awesome. Kenyi skillfully drove us from site to site in busy traffic.
Walter was a wealth of knowledge explaining the Convent,catacombs,historic downtown and Circuito Magica Del Aqua.Always seeing if we had any questions.
Walter also took pictures for us and video as our phone wasn’t taking good pictures.He forwarded them to us after the tour so we have some great pictures and video.
A fun professional tour we really enjoyed
Written March 12, 2024

OK ish

Guide was great. Just seemed to spend more time in traffic then at the attractions but I suppose that’s just Lima. Catacombs fascinating and fully explained. Water fountains bit of a let down. Just a projected show onto the fountains
Written September 2, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
Shane O
18 contributions

Great late afternoon/ evening option for Lima

This is a great way to see the catacombs and light show. Although you could see these places more cheaply independently, the combination of a knowledgeable tour guide (we had Susan show us around, she had so much local knowledge… right down to the best photo opportunities) and transport (we had Kenyi drive us around) allows you to get much more out of the experience, whilst feeling very safe.
Written September 1, 2023
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
setfire
Vancouver, Canada115 contributions

Thank you Alex (Alexandra)!!!

Sep 2022
Amazing experience, and it's all thanks to Alex! She was so friendly and very knowledgeable about Peru and Lima. We learned a lot about the history of Peru, and she also gave us a lot of information as we walked through the historic area of Lima. The Water Magic Circuit was a really cool experience and the bicentennial show was impressive, giving a concise, visual summary of Peru's history. Wonderful evening and it far exceeded my expectations.
Written October 11, 2022
This review is the subjective opinion of a Tripadvisor member and not of Tripadvisor LLC. Tripadvisor performs checks on reviews as part of our industry-leading trust & safety standards. Read our transparency report to learn more.
KenyiPe
We are glad you enjoyed the experience. Thanks!

reviews.title: Great way to spend an evening!
reviews.text: Very interesting tour!  It included more sites than I expected.  The guide was very knowledgable and friendly.  We had lots of fun and learned some things too!

reviews.title: Fountains are Amazing
reviews.text: Seeing the fountains at night was amazing.  Puts the Bellagio a bit to shame.  The colours, the lights and the amazing laser and picture projection was off the charts.  It was a beautiful park and the light show is a must.  Lots of room and good views but not a lot of seating.  Most people had to stand.
